snippet: The pause in shopping came against a backdrop of low joblessness and healthy home sales. Some suggested the presidential elections might be making consumers hesitant....
lead_paragraph: The pause in shopping came against a backdrop of low joblessness and healthy home sales. Some suggested the presidential elections might be making consumers hesitant.

headline.main: After 4 Months of Gains, Retail Sales Slip 0.3%
headline.print_headline: After 4 Months of Gains, Retail Sales Take a Cautious Turn
